DOC.brief_summary: An implementation project scale-up delivery antiretroviral-based HIV-1 prevention method Kenyan HIV-1 serodiscordant couple HIV-1 care center . Pre-exposure prophylaxis ( PrEP ) bridge antiretroviral therapy ( ART ) HIV-1 prevention strategy introduce 24 public HIV-1 care center central western Kenya accord national guideline use stepped wedge design , stratified region .
DOC.detailed_description: PrEP bridge ART strategy introduce 24 Kenyan public HIV-1 care center accord national guideline , staged fashion , stratified region ( stepped wedge design ) . Monitoring evaluation activity identify implementation barrier solution , characterize cost , provide best practice scale-up . A research component establish prospective open cohort couple clinic ( 200 ) study program effectively implement . Follow-up cohort 36 month care center evaluate impact , cost , facilitator barrier implementation patient , provider health system level .
DOC.criteria: For HIV1 uninfected member couple Age ≥18 Able willing provide consent followup cohort HIV1 uninfected base negative HIV1 test , per Kenya national guideline Not currently use PrEP For HIV1 infect member couple Age ≥18 Able willing provide consent followup cohort HIV1 infect base positive HIV1 test , per Kenya national guideline Not currently use ART For member couple Meet criterion initiate PrEP per Kenya national guideline , include : HIV1 infect member currently use ART , ART < 6 month , ART virally suppress base viral load test do clinic per Kenya national guideline Trying conceive For key delivery informant Able willing provide consent Otherwise eligible base inclusion criterion
